description: A simple dashboard that can monitor libvirt KVM

panels.description: Total time (ns) spent on reads on a block device, in ns, that is, 1/1,000,000,000 of a second, or 10−9 seconds.
panels.title: Read time

panels.description: Total time (ns) spent on writes on a block device, in ns, that is, 1/1,000,000,000 of a second, or 10−9 seconds.
panels.title: Write time

panels.description: Resident Set Size of the process running the domain, in bytes.
panels.title: Resident Set Size

panels.description: The total amount of data read from swap space
panels.title: Swap Read

panels.description: The total amount of memory written out to swap space
panels.title: Swap Written

panels.description: Number of packets received on a network interface.
panels.title: RX Packets

panels.description: Number of packets transmitted on a network interface.
panels.title: TX Packets

panels.description: Number of packet receive errors on a network interface.
panels.title: RX Packets Error

panels.description: Number of packet transmit errors on a network interface
panels.title: TX Packets Error

panels.description: Number of packet receive drops on a network interface.
panels.title: RX Packets Drop

panels.description: Number of packet transmit drops on a network interface.
panels.title: TX Packets Drop

title: Libvirt Dashboard Openstack - Admin
